title: Enchanting Nakshatra Diamond and Emerald Cascade Haaram
materials: Genuine Emeralds. Features a signature Hyderabadi Polish for a radiant finish.
features: This exquisitely crafted necklace features a cascading floral design, meticulously embellished with brilliant-cut diamonds. The pendant culminates in a striking arrangement of vibrant green emeralds, adding a touch of regal charm. The delicate gold filigree work and diamond settings showcase exceptional artistry. The chain is designed in a modern mesh pattern.
colors: Primarily gold and white (diamonds) with vibrant green emerald accents.
occasions: and high-end parties. A stunning choice for Muhurtham ceremonies or to elevate a contemporary saree ensemble.
description: This haaram is a captivating fusion of modern design and traditional Indian aesthetics. The high-quality diamonds and emeralds ensure lasting brilliance, while the intricate craftsmanship reflects generations of expertise. It's a statement piece that effortlessly enhances any look, making it a cherished addition to your jewelry collection.
